article.headline: BYU 90, Idaho State 66
article.story: SANTA CLARA, Calif. (AP) -- Rafael Araujo had game highs of 23 points and 11 rebounds to lead Brigham YounW over Idaho State 90-66 Monday night in the second semifinal game of the Cable Car Classic.t title. BYU controlled the game most of the first half, and an 11-0 run gave the Cougar��The Cougars scored the final eight points of the half to regain the momentum and scored the first nine of the second half for a 48-27 advantage with 18:08 left in the game. Lemes's three-point shot with 15:11 left gave BYU its largest lead at 56-30. Idaho State made another run, scoring 10 consecutive points, nine of them on three-point shots by Jeff Gardner, to trail 58- 3. A three-pointot by Nade Redes made it 62-50 at 9:45, but that was as close as the Bengals got. Gardner hit seven of 10 shots -- five of six from three-point range -- and scored 22 points. Marquis Poole added 11 points and Scott Henry 10 for the Bengals.
